text: Don can stand for different concepts: *It is one of the main rivers in Russia, see Don River (Russia) *It is a name, see Donald (given name) for people with this name *Don (honorific), an honorific used in Spanish, Portuguese, Italian and Filipino *2,5-Dimethoxy-4-nitroamphetamine is abbreviated DON; it is a hallucinogen *Vomitoxin, also known as DON, is a toxin produced by different fungi *6-Diazo-5-oxo-L-norleucin, is an amino acid, that is tested as a chemotherapy against cancer. It is known as DON. *Nitrogen is sometimes referred to as DON
title: Don
